title: Science Education Design Based on Augmented Reality and Vertical Discourse

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Professionals in medical/legal/technical fields require strengthened competencies to critically analyze augmented reality technologies and their educational applications within societal contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the scientific principles of augmented reality technology by connecting them through vertical discourse methods
It is possible to analyze the social classification system inherent in the application of augmented reality within an educational context.
By designing vertical discourse-based learning activities, it is possible to evaluate the ideological characteristics of technical discourse.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
